mapper.insert: INSERT INTO B_POST ( title, content, url, user_no, board_type, created_at, last_modified_at ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{content}, #{url}, #{user_no}, #{board_type}, sysdate(), sysdate() )
mapper.select: SELECT title, content, url, created_at, last_modified_at FROM B_POST WHERE board_type = 'Notice' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
mapper.update: UPDATE B_POST SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, url = #{url}, user_no = #{user_no}, board_type = #{board_type}, last_modified_at = sysdate(), state = #{state} WHERE seq = #{boardId};
